page.title: 19Working from home: FINTRY
page.content:
Having salesmen scattered from Darlington in England to Inverness in Scotland, I am responsible for the recruitment, training, sales targeting and motivation of a sales team.
Fintry has good access to motorways and airports, Edinburgh, Glasgow and Stirling, therefore it is a site with excellent communications.
Home offers peace and quiet and few interuptions, unlike a normal office complex, and yet gives access to all facilities, equipment and support staff, which makes for efficient working.
There are two possible drawbacks; the loss of a room at home and the inability, to slip in for a noggin on the way home,{but neither apply to me.
